meanings.definition: To add as a supplement or appendix.
meanings.sent1: I appended a note to the end of my report.
meanings.sent2: She appended her signature at the bottom of the contract.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel appended an acorn to its collection of nuts.
meanings.sent4: His smile appended a touch of warmth to his stern face.
meanings.sent5: The artist appended a splash of red to the painting, making it pop.

meanings.sent1: He appended a keychain to his backpack.
meanings.sent2: The worker appended the document to the email.
meanings.sent3: The cat playfully appended a toy mouse to its tail.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter appended a joyful atmosphere to the room.
meanings.sent5: The flowers appended a burst of color to the garden.
